document.full_text: the government plans to blow up a third section of a mississippi river levee on wednesday night to allow flood water back into the river, as river levels upstream continue to drop.
document.title: u.s. plans to blow third hole in missouri levee
lines_and_colors: the government plans to blow up a third section of a mississippi river levee on wednesday night to allow flood water back into the river, as river levels upstream continue to drop.
